config.question: How did business management play an important role in the reforms being undertaken by the progressives?

choices.content: Business management schools undertook projects for the government.
The recruitment of management professionals was made compulsory.
Most urban reformers were management professionals themselves.
Urban reformers used business practices to construct model governments.
